12.content:
So you're an alien you say? (not from Earth) With a body similar to a human/ape?

okay. Then how does your species reproduce?

Asexually: to reproduce with only one organism; has no gender; grows/branches off of the parent's body and then starts its life. (example: bacteria, viruses, hydras (except u'v actually got a brain unlike them))

Sexually: to reproduce with two (but since you are some sort of alien, two or more) (example: Humans (but ur aren't one), Asari (a fictional species from mass effect (a video game for xbox360)))
12.title: Alien humanoid species

122.content:
Ah. So if you were to ever reproduce you would like to do it with another/other organism/companion(s).

But does your species have 1 gender(mono-gendered), 2 genders (di-gendered)(like humans), or are they multi-gendered?

Mono-gendered: the species reproduce with 2, same-sex organisms of their species. A great example would be the fictional species from Mass Effect, the Asari, who reproduce by "melding" mentally. Just for the readers' curiosity, the Asari look like blue-ish-skined humanoid women. (google it for further info ;])

Di-gendered: the species reproduce with 2, opposite/same-sex organisms of their species. Humans reproduce with the opposite sex.

Multi-gendered: obviously, multi-gendered species have multiple genders. Whether they must reproduce with all type of genders, some types, specific types, same types, or opposite types of genders, you will have to decide a little later.
122.title: Sexually

choices: with the same or opposite sex
only both sexes (like a necessary reproductive process) or it's optional
1222.content:
Then Di-gendered you are.

Do you HAVE to reproduce with the opposite sex? Or is same-sex reproduction optional? Or do you have to do it with both sexes, or is reproducing with both sexes optional?

(keep in mind that this just means for reproductive means; not that you cannot be gay)

Both-gender-reproduction: your species needs both genders to mate with you like a certain process in order to reproduce. This process is either the only way to reproduce your species, or it is an optional ritual/process/whatever-thing that helps enhance your offspring.

You can reproduce:
1222.title: Your species is Di-gendered

1223.content:
So you have several genders within your species.

How many?
1223.title: Your species is Multi-gendered

12233.content: So what is it? Does your species have 5 genders or more?
12233.title: 5 genders (pento-gendered), Or More

13.content:
So what kind of Mythological/fictional/made-up creature/species are you?

A half breed: an animal made up of pieces of different animals (examples: merfolk (mermaids and mermen), minotaurs, centaurs, fauns, naginis and nagas, chimeras, sirens, sphinxes, succarathes, etc.)

A Giant something: big creature (example: a giant human, a giant chicken, Ziz, Leviathan, Taurus, etc.)

A Humanoid creature: (examples: nymphs, fairys, succubi, incubi, vampires, yetis (abominable snowmen), zombies, trolls, orcs, elves, dwarves, gnomes, sylphs, ghosts, selkies, pixies, gorgons, monopods, imps, etc.)

A legendary/rare creature: (examples: phoenixes, unicorns, Pegasus, Ziz, Leviathan, taurus, Scylla, hydras, etc.)
13.title: A mythological/fictional creature

132.content: What kind of giant creature?

1321.content: Gender of your giant?
1321.title: Giant

13212.content:
The city shook as the giant female entered the city. People gazed in awe at the massive female as she entered. Men gazed at her beautifully sculpted body, women and others stayed out of her way.

The giantess was oblivious to the tiny people at her feet. She was merely passing through, she hoped that the people would get out of her way before she accidentally stepped on one.

There was one who refused to get out of her way. He was a young man who had been watching the giantess for some time and had fallen in love with her each time she passed by.

He knew he had to seize his chance of asking her out and this was his time. He rushed infront of the giantess took a step and shouted to her. " Hey! Miss, would you go out with me?" asked the little man.

Before she replys, what is the giantess?
13212.title: Female

132121.content:
The giantess looked and saw a little man at her feet. He was shouting something to her. She bent down to get a clearer idea of what he was saying. He wants to go out with me?, she thought, blushing. She would have to reply.


" OF COURSE!" replied the giantess, her booming voice travelling down to his ears. " Wonderful!" said the little man. " How about you meet me at the beach tonight?" asked the man. " Sounds fun, I'll come after work." said the giantess.

She continued her journey into the city, leaving the little man's heart filled with joy as he finally scored a date with his dream girl.
132121.title: Good

choices: Continue to your first day of school at Yokai Acadamey
1451.content:
This story line will take place in the anime Rosario + Vampire where monsters try to act like humans so they can both live in the same world together. All of the characters of that anime are most likely going to interact with you but its all up to you.

Description about you (Or you can make up your own character
You are a God/Demon Lord thought to be dead as it was written in the history books. You were sent to this school by your own choice so you could learn what its like to go to school with monsters. Since you had all the powers a normal god had so you could morph into anyform you want and gain anypowers. You are like Moka and her vampire form but you have 3 different sides to you (Normal, God, Demon) that you can control plus sometimes you can Possess all 3 of them at once. From previous knowledge you don't have any bright point of view of monsters and humans because you both think that they are idiot species that live in this world but that all changes when you meet new friends at Yokai Acadamy.

Your part in history
You played a major roll in history that deals with the war between gods and demons but not many people even know about this and even believe it to be true. The only reason why you are half god and half demon is because you ended the war between the two great beings by creating a barrier between the two but the cost was that you had to become half god and half demon which made you like a key if anyone were to break the barrier. This mean't if anyone wanted to break the seal they would need you to do so.

Life after the war (This explains why you hate humans and monsters)
After the great war two new species were created by both gods and demons two maintain balance in the world which they created both human and monsters. Humans were made by the hands of gods and monsters were made by the hands of demons. This was the one wish you gave to both of the great beings. Since you were the one to create the barrier you were the only god/demon that was able to rome the earth. But after watching the humans and monsters live with each other you were disgusted by how they treated each other and left them to handle there problems on there own.

Now
It's been 2000 years since you've seen any humans or monsters since you spent those years alone and away from humans and monsters. When you came back there was a seperation between the two kinds. You then discovered the schooling that they have created and decided to go to Yokai Acadamey a school for monsters.

More Information about your forms
Normal: This is form was made to keep your powers as a Demon lord and God hidden from anyone.
God: Has more of a bright and wiser side unlike your Demon form you aren't as destructive and you like to be more assertive. But if needed you will show his wrath to put everything back in its place.
Demon: Not very bright and can be very intimidating like Moka's vampire form. When fighting you will be more destructive and like to be more aggresive. But you can control your temper and you are also still wise in your Demon form.
God and Demon: Everything from you God form and Demon form balances out with you having the powers of the Demon and God.
1451.title: Story 1

choices: Continue to your first day of school at Yokai Acadamey
Continue to your first day of school at Yokai Acadamey
14511.content:
Before you start here is some extra information about your height and grade.
Body
You were supposed to be in 7th grade in middle school but you were allowed to be a first year at Yokai Academy. Now you aren't as Moka in school wise yet. You could if you used your powers to learn all about school. Your height is 4.1 which is a little shorter than Yukari.

Thats all for now. Enjoy and have fun!
14511.title: Continue to your first day of school at Yokai A...

145111.content:
You were told to wait at a bus stop which you were unfamiliar with and wait for the bus to pick you up. The uniform you were currently wearing was a black one and you were only given 5 blacks and the rest were greens. You never got a paper telling you why to wear the special black on but you only wore it because it looked better than the green one.

Finally the bus came and when it opened you saw a guy driving. "Hey you going to Yokai Academy" he said. "Who me" you asked. "Thats right" he responded. "Correct" you then said. "Alrighty then hope on" he said signaling you to come inside. "Uh thank you sir" you said walking and standing in the middle of the hallway of the bus. "Um can you please sit down" he asked. "Oh ok" you said then sat down in the second row. Then the bus began moving again.

"Hey you look a little short to be a 1st year" he said look at you through a mirror. "Correct, its because I was able to skip middle school and they allowed me to come here" you said. "So you must be one of those smart kids" he asked. "I'm not to sure sir" you said. "Well ok then. Anyway just call me bus driver, sir sounds a way above my pay roll" he said. "Ok bus driver" you said.

When you guys passed through the tunnel you say a whole bunch of dead trees and a look out on to the ocean. "Ok were here" he said opening the doors. "Oh, thank you sir- I mean bus driver" you said walking off the bus. "Well you be safe now going to this school" he said. "Well what do you mean" you asked. "Lets just say its not exactly normal, anyway I guess this is good bye for now" he responded. "Yes farwell" you said then the door closed and the bus left. "I guess I follow the pathway to the school then" you said then you made your way to the school.

Once you reached the school you went straight to the Administrators office. You say a lady sitting at the desk (Picture of her: http://pre08.deviantart.net/1324/th/pre/...) and walked up to her "Uh excuse me ma'am" you said. "Oh yes dear, oh thats a strange looking uniform but it does look like the green one" she said. "Yes, this is one of the uniforms I was given" you told her. "Well ok then, judging by the looks of you, you must have skipped middle school" she said. "Thats correct. Anyways, can I ask you a question" you said. "Of course, what is it" she asked. "Well I have no idea where I'm going. Do you know were I must be right now" you asked. "First you need to go to your dorm which is right here on the map and we are currently right here" she said showing you the map of the school layout. "Thank you ma'am" you said. "Oh please call me nekonome sensei" she said. "Ok nekonome sensei" you responded. "Haha, anyways today there are no classes going on, so I'd suggest you try getting familiar with the students and the school itself" she said. "Ok thank you Nekonome sensei" you said then left the room with a map of the school.

You were walking through the hallway near the class. And when you turned the corner you bumped into.
145111.title: Continue to your first day of school at Yokai A...

1451111.content:
When you walked around the corner you bumped into someone wearing a green uniform which knocked you to the ground. "Oh my gosh. I'm sorry let me help you up" he said extending his hand (Picture of him: http://img3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20130...). *Can I trust him* you thought to yourself, you still had your opion about monsters and but you let him help you up anyways. "No no sir its ok" you said grabbing his hand as he pulled you up. "Hey whats with your uniform are you like a special student or something" he asked. "Oh me, no probably not" you said. "Well thats strange, anyways I'm Tsukune Aono. And I'm sorry for knocking you down there" he said. "No its not you fault sir" you said doing a respectful bow.

"Hey theres no need to call me sir, you can just call me Tsukune" he said. "Oh ok Tsukune. My name is Kamutori Takashi and I'm a first year at this school" you introduced yourself you real name was Kiminari but if you told anyone that they might find out who you really are. "Well Kamutori I hope you have fun here this school is a little strange times" Tsukune said. *So him and the Mr. Bus driver say the same thing about this place* you thought to yourself. "Oh before I go can you tell me where the cafeteria is" you said. "I see, are you trying to get familiar with everywhere" he asked. "Correct, so far I've found the office, boys dorm, and I'm still trying to find my class" you told him. "Then why don't I show you around" he said. "Thank you very much I owe you all of my thanks" you said bowing. "Oh no problem. Where do you want to go next cafeteria or classroom" he asked. "I guess I can find my classroom last so cafeteria please" you said. "Alright then lets go" he then started walking.

You finally got to the cafeteria "Here we are" he said showing it you. "Thats strange I swore I past this area. Thank you Tsukune" you bowed again. "Ok the bowing thing is way to formal man you don't have to" he said. "I'm sorry, I learned that this is how you show repect or thanks" you said. Before you came into the human world you read how to be respectful to humans and mosters so you didn't get in to a battle with them. "It is but were friends right. And friends don't always need to bow each other" he said. "Friends" you mubbled in a confused tone. "Oh what was that" he asked. "

"OH HEY TSUKUNE" you heard a girl yell then you saw
1451111.title: Tsukune Aono

14511111.content:
You then saw a pink haired girl running this way (Picture of her: https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/-YAwCE...). "Oh hey Moka" Tsukune said when she caught up with you guys. "Oh whos this" she said looking at you. "This is Kamutori Takashi we just met" Tsukune said introducing you. "Its very nice to meet you and you are" you asked and bowed for your introduction. "Oh I'm Moka Akashinya. Thats strange you have a black uniform, wonder what that means" she said. "Yes, I also have no idea why these were given to me" you said. "So what you guys doing" she asked. "Well I'm showing Kamutori around the school since this is his first day" Tsukune explained. "Oh, is ok if I come along" she asked. "Of course, I owe you my thanks as well then" you said bowing to her. "Yea no problem. Did you find your class yet" she asked. "No not yet I asked Tsukune-san if he could show me around" you told her. "Oh ok why try showing you the sport places then" she said. "Yea thats a great place to show you then" Tsukune agreed. "Ok then" you said.

They showed you to the pool area, then the soccer feilds, and then almost every part of the school. The last place that was on your check list was your class. "This school is quite big" you commented you were all back inside of the cafeteria. "Yea I guess you could say that, hey why don't we show you the newspaper club" Tsukune suggested. "Yea we can introduce you to our other friends" Moka added. "That sounds great" you said then bowing again. Then you all started walking off to the newspapers club classroom.

"Here we are" Moka said opening the door. You saw a witch girl and a blue haird girl sitting at a table. "Hey everybody I would like to introduce you to Kamutori Takashi" Tsukune introduced you. "Hello" you said bowing to them. "Hi, my name is Kurumu Kurono but you can just say Kurumu" the blue haired girl said (Picture of her: http://orig08.deviantart.net/6084/f/2012...). "And my name is Yukari Sendo but you can call me Yukari" the witch girl said (Picture of her: http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/rosa...). "So do you plan on joing the newspaper club" Kurumu asked. "Oh um uh" you said not knowing what a newspaper thing was anyway. "Oh todays his first day so I don't think we should just slam that into him" Moka said. "Oh I'm so sorry" she said. "No no no, its not your fault you never knew" you said bowing. "Aww, your too cute" she said giggling. *Did just call me cute, maybe cute doesn't mean punny anymore* you thought to yourself. "So what are you guys doing" the Yukari asked. "Oh were just showing him around the school since its his first day here. And we decided to stop by the newpaper club" Tsukune said. "Oh mind if I tag along" Kurumu asked. "Oh and me too" Yukari added. "Its up to you Kamutori" Tsukune said. "Yes you may and I owe you my thanks" you said bowing.

You all walked out of the classroom and into the hallway. "So where we going" Kurumu asked. "Well thats all up to Kamutori" Tsukune said. "Umm. I believe everything on my check list has been checked oh wait one more place" you said. "Oh ok what is it" Moka asked. "My classroom is the last place" you said. "Oh ok lets get a move on then" Kurumu said. "Ok but first, what class is it Kamutori" Tsukune asked. "Oh its was this one right here" you pointed on the map. "Well, heres the way" Tsukune said.

Finally you all reached the classroom. "Oh wow you have the same classroom as me, Moka, and Kurumu" Tsukune said. "Oh thats great, at least there some people I know in my classroom then" you said. "Thats strange how are you in our class weren't you a first year" Moka said. "Correct, but wait how is that strange" you asked. "Well your a first year and its all of our second year at the academy, they usally have students in different levels in different class rooms" Moka explained. "Wait, all of you are my upper classmen" you asked. "Thats right me too" Yukari said. *If I learned name titles correctly then aren' upperclass men called-* you thought to yourself then said "Wait if you are all my upperclass men then I must call you Senpai" you said. "WAIT WHAT WE DIDN'T TEACH YOU ANYTHING" Tsukune said freaking out. "YEA WE JUST SHOWED YOU AROUND THE SCHOOL YOU DON'T NEED TO CONSIDER YOURSELF A STUDENT OF US" Moka said. "Yes, but if your my upperclass men I will have to or else-" you said then the thought of war came to your head. You remembered some battle from gods and demons came from one wanting respect. "No I have to, I don't want that happening again" you said. "Wait what happening again" Kurumu asked. "Oh its nothing sorry Kurumu-Senpai" you said bowing. "Wait what" Kurumu said. "Kamutori you don't need to call us Senpai" Moka said. "Yea Kamutori its ok just call us by our first name" Yukari added. "Please, Moka-Senpai and Yukari-Senpai allow me to do this for my sake" you said then bowing to both of them. "Sake of what" Tsukune asked. "I very sorry prefer not to say sorry Tsukune-Senpai" you said then bowing to him.

"OH GOSH" they all said.
14511111.title: Moka Akashinya

145111111.content:
The next day you woke up in your dorm and started getting ready for class. You really didn't want to share a dorm with anyone just in case they were.. Well you know. "Great, I can't believe they have that rule of calling upper classmen senpai in this world. They said I didn't have to but that could be a trap" you said to yourself. Although you did make a new friend or at least thats what they say, but just to be safe yu just continued to call upper classmen senpai. "Alright time for class" you said and contiuned toward the school. Today you wore the green uniform just in case you weren't suppose to wear the black one.

You reached the doors that lead to the classroom but then...
145111111.title: The next day

1451111111.content:
"AHHHHH" you heard a familiar voice screaming. "Whats that" you said to yourself but then when you turned to your left you saw Yukari-Senpai run right into you. "Huh, oh Kamutori its you. Sorry for that" she said getting off of you. "No its not your fault Yukari-Senpai. Whats going with you this morning" you said bowing after standing yourself up. "Sorry those guys over there are chasing me" she said pointing to some guys who looked like major touble.

One had black hair the other had light brown hair "Hey kid why don't you step aside you have no part in this" the guy with black hair said said. "Hi there (you bowed), I see that I have no part in this, however I would like to know why you chase my friend" you asked. "Well lets say she has been causing some trouble to me and my friend" he said. "Ya thats right" the guy with brown hair said. "Yukari-Senpai is this true" you asked her. "Hey they started it, they backed me against the wall and were about to hurt me, so I slammed them with gold pots" she said. "With what-" you questioned but then you were interrupted by the guy with black hair. "Why don;t you just stand aside and let us handle this" he said. "What exactly do you plan on doing" you asked. "Finish this whole problem" he said then bean poping his knuckles. "What does he mean Yukari-Senpai" you asked her. "They're going to hurt me" she said. "WHAT! Sorry but if what Yukari-Senpai is true then I can't allow this" you told them. "Maybe you don't understand this whole thing. Why don't you just shut up and get out of the way before I do something about you" the guy black hair said. "Sorry I will not" you said. "WHY YOU" they both said then start coming after you. "Take this" Yukari-Senpai said then gold pot came out of no where and landed on top of their heads. "Where did those come-" you said then inturrupted by Yukari-Senpai pulling you toward the doors of school. "Hurry lets get inside" she said then dragging you into class.
1451111111.title: Yukari-senpai came running into you

14511111111.content:
Yukari dragged you all the way to the Newspaper's Club classroom. "Wait, what are we doing here" you asked her. "Everyone else should be inside here" she responded opening the door.

Inside you saw Tsukune-Senpai, Moka-Senpai, Kurumu-Senpai, a purple haired girl (Picture of her: http://img4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20110...) , and a black haired guy (Picture of him: http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/rosa...) . "Oh hey its Yukari and Kamutori" Kurummu said as you guys walked in. "Oh what happened to you guys, why are you panting so hard" Tsukune asked. "I being chased by 2 older guys and Kamutori came in and helped" Yukari explained. "Well you're the one who did most of the work, Yukari-Senpai" you added.

"Wow, how did you get this guy to call you Senpai" the guy with black hair asked. "He calls all upperclassmen Senpai" Moka explained. "Here let me introduce you guys. Kamutori this is Mizore and Ginei. Ginei and Mizore this is Kamutori" Tsukune Introduced. "Hey" Mizore and Ginei said at the same time. "Nice to meet you too" you said doing a bow. "Ok no need to be too formal just put it there" Ginei said extending his hand to you. You were puzzled by what he was doing. "Uh, sorry to ask, but what's this" you asked. "Is this guy serious" Ginei asked everyone else in the room. "I like him, he's kind of funny" Mizore commented.

"Sorry, but where I come from this doesn't exist" you said. "Oh, well this is called a hand shake, so just grab my hand and move it up and down" he explained. You just went in for very hesitantly. "There you go that's it right there" he said cheerfully. "Wow, its a lot easier then I thought. I'm assuming you guys are both second years,right" you asked referring to Mizore and Ginei. "Yes" Mizore confirmed. "Oh then I guess you are all my Senpai's right"
14511111111.title: Meeting the rest of the Newspaper club

choices: Moka, tsukune, Kurumu, and Mizore come in
145111111112.content:
You, Tsukune, moka, and Kurumu all went to class and waited for it to start. "Hey Kamutori, what was Yukuri talking about earlier" Tsukune asked. "Are you referring to the two guys who were talking to her before" you questioned. "Yea" he responded. "From what I saw; the two guys were trying to harm her, but luckily a few golden pots hit them out of no where" you answered still wondering about where those pots came from.

Witches in the past never used spells like that, the ones used before where more violent. Although that was during the start of the war between Humans and Monsters.

"So, do you remember what they look like" Moka a jumped in and asked. "I believe one guy had black hair and another had light-brown hair" you responded. "Ok, but I hope they stop" Tsukune said then turning back to his desk. "Yeah I agree" Moka said then facing back to her desk.

You turned a looked out the window thinking about the whole situation. "What on earth do those guys want with Yukari" you thought to yourself then waited for class to start.

After school was finished you noticed the same two guys from earlier walking off of school campus. And then you noticed Yukari walking off in the same direction. Suddenly you see Yukari get snatched by the same two guys and they ran in to the woods. You felt as if something bad was going to happen to her, so you immediately broke in the sprint and started chasing them.

Finally, you were able to see them having Yukari tied up to a tree. One of the guys were about to attack Yukari and you knew you had to do something this. "HEY BACK AWAY FROM HER" you yelled at them. "Oh great it's the same guy from earilier" the guy black haired guy commented. "Quick Kamutori get help you can't take them on by yourself they're both warewolfs, which is S-ranked monster" Yukari yelled. "There's no time" you said stepping forward. "Ha, does this guy really think he can take on two S-ranked monsters, how pathetic" the brown haired guy said. "Lets just finish him now why don't we" the black haired guy siad then they both took a step forward then...
145111111112.title: Go to class

1451111111121.content:
The two warewolfs began come at you, suddenly a ice wall appeared in front of you. "What's this" you asked yourself. "Don't worry were here" you heard Tsukune's voice come from behind you. When you turned around you saw Tsukune, Moka, Kurumu, and Mizore running toward you.

"What are you all doing here" you asked them. "We saw Yukari being chased and you running after her, so we knew something was up and came here to help" Kurumu said. "So where did this wall come from" you asked. "That was me" Mizore said. "Well I must thank you for helping, however I don't know how this will make anything better" you said. "Why" Moka asked. "I've heard from Yukari that there both warewolfs" you answered.

"WHAT BOTH S RANKED SUPER BEAST" Kurumu yelled. "HEY WHATS GOING ON" one of the warewolf guys yelled. The ice wall turned into spears and were thrown at the 2 warewolf guys. "WERE HERE TO GET OUR FRIEND BACK. Don't worry we can take them on, right guys. Tsukune if you can" Moka said walking up to Tsukune. "Yea, no problem" Tsukune said then pulled off Moka's necklace.

You saw Moka's form change right before your eyes. Her hair turned white and her body seemed a little bit more muscular. "What's this" you said. "This is Moka's vampire form" Mizore answered. "Isn't that also considered an S ranked super beast.

"Let me start this off" Moka said walking up to the two warewolfs. "Can we get this over with quickly so we can get our friend back" Moka asked the two guys. "If you want then you'll have to get through us" one of them said. "Very well" she said then ran toward both of them.

First attacking the warewolf who looked like the brown haired guy. She was able to successfully kick down on his head. "WHY YOU" he said then attempted to grab her. Moka then, jumped on his head to dodge his attemped, but the other guy hit Moka fast and made her hit a tree. "MOKA" Kurumu said flying toward the warewolfs and Mizore joined her by creating ice spears come out of no wear.

However, their attacks were also unsuccessful. "You think you got, well not yet. Its time for you to know your place" Moka said getting up knocking one of the warewolfs off their feet then punching the other. Kurumu quickly got up and cut the rope wrapping Yukari to the tree. "Hey they freed Yukari-Senpai" you cheered from the side.

"Nice I think were done here" Kurumu said. "HAHAHA" the two warewolfs laughed getting back up. "Do you feel that man" one of them said. "Yup, this power" the other one said. "OH NO" Yukari said. "Its a full moon tonight" Mizore said then everyone looked up to see a huge full moon.

"C'mon guys lets finish this" Moka said charging at them. She attempted to hit one of them, but he quickly dodged her and the other one punched Moka so hard she slammed and made a whole in the ground. "HOW DARE YOU HURT MY FRIEND" Kurumu said flying them. But one of them quickly grabed her neck and rasied her in the air.

"NOT SO FAST" Yukari said about to swing her wand. Then the other warewolf came behind her and broke her wand. Following by throwig her against a tree, then went to attack Mizore, but she blocked with her ice. Sadly it didn't work because he broke through it then grabbed her neck as well.

Both of the warewolfs then tossed both Kurumu and Mizore aside. "Now its time to finish you two off" they said running toward you and Tsukune. "RUN KAMUTORI" Tsukune said. "WHAT" you yelled freezing up. You saw Tsukune open his arms as if he was going to protect you. "What do you think your doing that won't make a difference, you'll just get hurt" you said. "Don't worry it'll give you enough time" he said sounding desperate in your ears. "YOU FOOL" you yelled a change came intot he tone in your voice. You could feel the demon part of yourself coming out. "Kamutori-" he said, but getting cut off by one of the warewolfs pushing him to the side making him hit a tree.

"Your turn" one of them said grabbing you then throwing you hard in a different direction.

The throw was so hard it made you crash through the forest at least a few yards down from where every on else was. "Nice throw, that probably killed him" the blacked haired warewolf said. "Thanks" the other added. "KAMUTORI" Moka, Kurumu, Mizore, and Tsukune yelled. "Don't bother he's gone" the brown haired warewolf said.

But then you began to feel yourself turn into your
1451111111121.title: Moka, tsukune, Kurumu, and Mizore come in

15111.title: Plant kingdom

info.brief_description: You choose who you want to be. Make life a masterpiece of your fetish.
info.description:
This is a 1st person pov interactive.

The soul purpose of me making this interactive story is for other people to add to it since i, the author, am usually more of a reader than a writer. But i will of course add every so often.

Rules:

1. please use correct grammar
2. when introducing something new, please describe it with many details.
3. swearing/obsene humor and words like "pussy", "asshole", "bitch", "motherfucker" allowed so that writers and authors can emphasize in the situation/setting BUT don't throw insults at other writers (or me, the author), however angry or mean you are for some uncertain reason.

Take note that I will sometimes title the choices as "continue" or something like that. this means that whether the following situation is good or bad depends on your luck. But otherwise, the choices with give you more control over your in-story character.

and of corse, awesome additions will be returned with 100 or more gift points.
